text: Kwangenakanyenayeejeleabantubesilisaababiliabasebancane oyedwa wabo wathi “ngempela mina ngizibone (ephusheni) ngakha iwayini” yathi enye “ngempela mina ngizibone (ephuphweni) ngithwele ngekhanda lami isinkwa izinyoni zidlela kusona (bathi) sitshele incazelo yalokhu ngempela thina sikubona ungomunye wabenzi bokuhle.”
